paper_abstract: In this article we study a class of graph codes with cyclic code component codes as affine variety codes. Within this class of Tanner codes we find some optimal binary codes. We use a particular subgraph of the point-line incidence plane of as the Tanner graph, and we are able to describe the codes succinctly using Grobner bases.
paper_title: Optimal codes as Tanner codes with cyclic component codes
